chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
n: nat
i: nat
f: nat -> X
p: pos n

Goal:
fun2vec i n f#>p = f (i + pos2nat p)

Premises:
fun2vec : nat -> forall n : nat, (nat -> X) -> vec X n
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
pos2nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat
Notation pos := Fin.t
fun2vec_id : forall (i n : nat) (f : nat -> X), fun2vec i n f = vec_set_pos (fun p : pos n => f (i + pos2nat p))
fun2vec_lift : forall (i n : nat) (f : nat -> X), fun2vec i n (fun j : nat => f (S j)) = fun2vec (S i) n f
pos2nat_right : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos m), pos2nat (pos_right n p) = n + pos2nat p
Fin.weak : forall p0 : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p0 + ?m) -> pos (p0 + ?n) where ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
Nat.add_assoc : forall n m p : nat, n + (m + p) = n + m + p
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
pos2nat_left : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos n), pos2nat (pos_left m p) = pos2nat p
pos2nat_nxt : forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), pos2nat (pos_nxt p) = S (pos2nat p)
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p0 : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p0)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.L : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (?m + n0) where ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f0 : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f0 v w) p1 = f0 (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type] ?C : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type]
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type] ?C : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type]
Fin.R_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p0 : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.R n0 p0)) = n0 + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : vec ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.hd v ## VectorDef.tl v where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type] ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f0 : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f0 v) p1 = f0 (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.cast : pos ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> pos n0 where ?m : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- Type]
pos2nat_nat2pos : forall (n i : nat) (H : i < n), pos2nat (nat2pos H) = i
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p0 q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p0 = q where ?n : [X : Type i : nat n : nat f : nat -> X p : pos n |- nat]
vec_map_list_one : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (p : pos n) (f : pos n -> X), vec_map_list (vec_one p) f = f p :: nil

```coq
unfold fun2vec.
rewrite fun2vec_id.
simpl.
unfold vec_set_pos.
simpl.
rewrite Nat.add_assoc.
rewrite <- pos2nat_right.
apply VectorSpec.nth_map2.
auto.
Qed.```
